Package observer

Class InvocationObserver

java.lang.Object
observer.Observer
observer.InvocationObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverInterface
public class InvocationObserver extends Observer
An observer that initializes a metric associated with invocations upon initialization. Do not confuse this decorator with IdObserver class. This stores the id of the invoker to invoke a function the moment it gets selected by the PolicyManager.

This observer extends the Observer class.

See Also:
